name: Shree Pharmacy
description: supplying and exporting Eye Drop, Asthma
overview:
Since our inception in the year 2009, we, ‘Shree Pharmacy’, are one of the leading organizations actively engaged in trading, wholesaling, supplying and exporting a highly effective range of Asthmatic Inhaler, Eye Drop, Anti Cancer Drug, Oral Jelly, Pharmaceutical Injection, Drug, Capsule, & Tablet. Under this range we offer a plethora of products that comprises Combimist Inhaler, Seroflo Inhaler, Cyclomune Eye Drop, Travatan Eye Drop, Careprost Eye Drop, Ovidac Injection, Fertigyn Injection, Kamagra Jelly, Apcalis Jelly, Iressa, Taxotere among others.

Products: Pharma Tablet Pharmaceutical Drug Pharmaceutical Capsule Anti Cancer Drug

Quality Standards: We always strive to maintain effective quality standards in the offered range of products. To maintain the same, we always conduct stringent quality checks at definite intervals of time and follow strict policies. Hence, this assures the delivery of a defect-free range of products at the clients’ end. Our entire range of products is checked on several parameters before dispatch.

Our Team: With the hard work and persistent efforts of our team members, we have established a distinctive image in the industry. Our professionals are well-versed with the current trends of the industry. Moreover, we conduct several training sessions to make them aware about the industrial developments and demands.

Client Satisfaction: We always work with an objective of gaining maximum acceptances and appreciations of the customers. For ensuring the same, our vendors manufacture the entire range of products by making use of the advanced methodologies, tools and techniques.
